Quick Facts

EXIT   X

OTHER PARTIES

Page

Table of Contents

 

 

An HSR, or otherwise five or more workers at a workplace, may request the creation of a health and safety committee. The PCBU must establish the committee within two months of the request.

 

The PCBU must allow the committee members to spend as much time as necessary (within reason) to meet and perform their functions. The PCBU must pay committee members for that time at the rate they would be paid for their normal duties.

 

The PCBU must also allow the committee to access any information it possesses about workplace hazards and the health and safety of workers. The PCBU must not provide any personal or medical information that identifies workers without relevant consent.
